curated_text: Symbol: PFE. Year: 2022. Period: Q1. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: BMS, the High Court’s, CureVac AG, CureVac, the German Regional Court, Comirnaty, Accord Healthcare Ltd., the University of California, Trademark Office, the European Patent Office, the Patent Trial and Appeal Board, FDA, District Court, Sinotherapeutics Inc., Sinotherapeutics, MSN Laboratories Private Ltd., MSN, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd., Glenmark, PFIZER INC., UNAUDITED, Ibrance, Eucrisa, Braftovi, Alnylam Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Alnylam, Pfizer, Pharmacia & Upjohn Co., LLC, the U.S., ModernaTX, Inc., ModernaTX, Moderna US, US Inc., Pfizer Inc., Enanta Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Collaboration/Licensing Partners Eliquis, BMS Paragraph-IV, the Orange Book for Eliquis, the U.S. District Court, the District Court’s, the U.S. Court of Appeals, the Federal Circuit, Warner-Lambert, American Optical Corporation, American Optical, the District Court, the Third Circuit, Ranbaxy Laboratories Ltd., Multi-District Litigation, the Court of Appeals, Pfizer and Ranbaxy, the State of West Virginia, EpiPen, King and Meridian, Mylan, Protonix and/or Nexium 24HR, Consumer Healthcare JV, GSK, Docetaxel • Personal Injury Actions, Docetaxel, the Mississippi Consumer Protection Act, Zantac, Zantac OTC, Johnson & Johnson, the Multi-District Litigation, the State of New Mexico, City Council of Baltimore, Judicial Council Coordinated Proceeding, the Superior Court of California, Champix, Monsanto Company, Monsanto, Solutia Inc., Pharmacia & Upjohn Company, Solutia, New Monsanto, Wyeth Holdings Corporation, American Cyanamid Company, Bound Brook, the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection, the Bound Brook, the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Iraqi Ministry of Health In, the Iraqi Ministry of Health, Allergan Finance LLC, the Supreme Court, the State of New York, Viatris Securities Litigation, the Court of Common Pleas of, Mylan N.V., the Upjohn Business, Transactions. Context excerpt: competition and/or violations of antitrust laws. In addition to the challenges to the U.S. patents that are discussed below, patent rights to certain of our products or those of our collaboration/licensing partners are being challenged in various other jurisdictions. Some of our collaboration or licensing partners face challenges to the validity of their patent rights in non-U.S. jurisdictions. For example, in April 2022, the U.K. High Court issued a judgment finding invalid a BMS patent related to Eliquis due to expire in 2026. In November 2022, BMS received permission to appeal the High Court’s decision. Additional challenges remain pending in other jurisdictions. Also, for example, in July 2022, CureVac AG (CureVac) brought a patent infringement action against BioNTech and certain of its subsidiaries in the German Regional Court alleging that Comirnaty infringes certain German utility model patents and certain expired and unexpired European patents. Additional challenges involving C

For example, in April 2022, the U.K. High Court issued a judgment finding invalid a BMS patent related

competition and/or violations of antitrust laws.
